article: A successful businessman was growing old and knew it was time to choose a successor to take over the business. Instead of choosing one of his children,he decided to do something different.He _ all the young executives in his company together,and said,"I will give each one of you a seed today. I want you to plant the seed,water it,and come back here one year from today with what you have grown from the seed. I will then _ your plants,and the one I choose will be the next CEO." Jim was there that day and he also received a seed. He went home _ , and got a pot,some soil and planted the seed. Everyday,he watered it and watched to see if it had grown, _ nothing ever grew. Time flew,and it was time to bring back their plants to the boss. When Jim arrived,he was amazed at the variety of plants grown by the other executives. They were all _ -in all shapes and sizes. When the old CEO arrived,he _ the room and greeted his young executives. "My!What great plants,trees,and flowers you have grown." All of a sudden,the CEO _ Jim at the back of the room with his _ pot.He asked him what had happened to his seed-Jim told him his _ . The CEO looked at Jim,and then _ to the young executives,"Now we have the next Chief Executive Officer-his name is Jim!"Nobody could _ it,including Jim himself. Then the CEO said,"One year ago the seeds I gave everyone were all boiled seeds;it was not _ for them to grow. Remember,everyone,if you plant honesty,you will reap trust."
